channel.title: Success Stories on Stock2Shop
channel.description: Recent content in Success Stories on Stock2Shop

item.title: Omnico
item.description: Imports leading lifestyle and cycle brands in South Africa.

item.title: AL & CD Ashley
item.description: Imports and distributes high quality cookware.

item.title: Falke
item.description: Develops stylish fashion for modern people: men’s and women’s fashion and sport socks and underwear.

item.title: Virgin Active
item.description: Enriches people’s lives through physical activity.

item.title: Calasca
item.description: Calasca supplies a wide variety of high quality products to the wholesale and retail markets, including homeware, kitchenware, kids & toys.

item.title: Silveray
item.description: Manufacturer and distributor of leading stationery brands, including Croxley, Parker, Sellotape, Sharpie, Stabilo and more.

item.title: PJ Marketing
item.description: PJ Marketing is an importer and wholesaler of quality kitchenware to the retail and hospitality industries. They needed to be able to give their customers a way to upload a CSV file for bulk orders.
